name: StarAir
description:
Team Fuzzy Tail's StarAir is the second and final game from Team Fuzzy Tail. Take down robotic drones as Max, who dons the role of the famous bounty hunter StarAir formerly held by his father. Pick up weapon cards and upgrade your ship to bring justice(?) to the galaxy!

As a note, this version of the game is a "Arcade" version of the game. Due to complications, the game was ultimately left unfinished and is not planned to resume development anytime soon. You can play around a 10-15 minute version of what was going to be the game's first prologue episode.

How to Play

Some controls in the game, such as advancing dialogue, is not mentioned in game. Please read the controls here as well!

In Menus

WASD/Arrow Keys - Selecting Options

Space/Enter - Selecting a Option

Esc - Unpausing/Previous Screen

In Game

F - Advances Dialogue

Arrow Keys - Change Dialogue Options

WASD - Movement

Spacebar/Left Mouse Click - Shoot

1/2/3 keys (or Q/E keys) - Swapping between cards

G - Discard a equipped card

Additional controls are provided in-game.

Features
  • DRAW A DECK OF WEAPONS! Using a card deck system, Max can pick up cards that transform into weapons for his ship!
  • PILOT STARAIR YOUR WAY Thanks to robust upgrading technology, both OS and System upgrades can be applied to the StarAir with skill points earned from leveling up! The possibilities are endless with 12 unique abilities (from the OS Upgrades Module) and 12 stat upgrades (from the System Upgrades module)! Play with choice unprecedented in a space shmup!
